title: The Ancestry of science: the god within
brief_description: The influence that contributed to early Greek philosophy and the beginnings of science. Shows the early philosophers seeking to rationalise the world around them; three explanations of the creation of the universe; the foreshadowing of modern quantitative chemistry.
